Package edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface ItemInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Corpse, Food, Item, MartianItem, Plank, PortableItem, Shotgun, ShotgunAmmunitionBox, SniperAmmunitionBox, SniperRifle, Stick, Vehicle, WeaponItem, ZombieArm, ZombieClub, ZombieLeg, ZombieMace
    public interface ItemInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Item, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int aim_turns()
      getter method for aim_turns
      java.lang.String craft​(Actor actor)
      Method that turns a weapon into another weapon
      java.lang.String craftDescription​(Actor actor)
      Method that returns a description of the action that can be carried out
      java.lang.Boolean isFood()  
      java.lang.Boolean isGun()
      This method will indicate whether an Item is a firearm
      java.lang.Boolean isWeapon()
      Method that returns a Boolean to determine if the Item is a weapon.
      int range()
      This method returns the range of a gun
      int ranged_damage()
      This method returns the range damage of a gun
      void reset()
      This method resets the concentration and target of a sniper rifle, this method is called when concentration is broken.
      java.lang.String secondary_verb()
      This method returns the verb when a gun is fired.

      setter for the aim_turns instance variable that represents the number of turns spent aiming with a sniper rifle

      setter method for the target of a sniper rifle
      Actor target()
      getter method for the target of a sniper rifle
      void use_ammo​(Actor actor)
      This method reduces ammunition count when a gun is fired.

      • craft

        java.lang.String craft​(Actor actor)
        Method that turns a weapon into another weapon
        Parameters:
        actor - actor that is holding the weapon
        Returns:
        a String that represents the action that had been carried out

      • set_aim_turns

        void set_aim_turns​(int count)
        setter for the aim_turns instance variable that represents the number of turns spent aiming with a sniper rifle
        Parameters:
        count - integer to be passed as the number of turns spent aiming

      • aim_turns

        int aim_turns()
        getter method for aim_turns
        Returns:
        integer that represents number of turns spent aiming

      • reset

        void reset()
        This method resets the concentration and target of a sniper rifle, this method is called when concentration is broken.

      • ranged_damage

        int ranged_damage()
        This method returns the range damage of a gun
        Returns:
        integer that represents the damage of a gun when it is fired.

      • use_ammo

        void use_ammo​(Actor actor)
        This method reduces ammunition count when a gun is fired.
        Parameters:
        actor - Actor that is firing the gun

      • range

        int range()
        This method returns the range of a gun
        Returns:
        integer that represents the range of a gun

      • isGun

        java.lang.Boolean isGun()
        This method will indicate whether an Item is a firearm
        Returns:
        true if Item is a firearm and false otherwise.

      • secondary_verb

        java.lang.String secondary_verb()
        This method returns the verb when a gun is fired.
        Returns:
        String that represents the verb when a gun is fired.
